name: War terminator:Escape the room
description:
This is a stimulating decryption game in which players will play a defensive player. Outside the city of the enemy mountains and plains, the city fighting sound and shaking days, the city is preserved or destroyed, all rely on your wisdom. Pick up your knife and use your wisdom to meet this epic challenge

  * Exquisite amount of 2d style
  * Clever puzzle design
  * From simple to complex, suitable for all puzzle game enthusiasts
